awards.description:
BUILD CONTINUING TRIBAL ADMINISTRATIVE CAPACITY
MAINTAIN ONGOING LIAISON CAPABILITIES WITH MINING INDUSTRY OFFICIALS, STATE AND FEDERAL AGENCIES &AMPAND COMMUNICATE APPROPRIATE INFO TO TRIBE   
MANAGE SOLID WASTE OPERATIONS AND SOURCE SEPARATION EFFORTS FOR THE PEDRO BAY TRANSFER FACILITY
UPDATE PEDRO BAY&RSQUOANDS INTEGRATED SOLID WASTE MANAGEMENT PLAN (IWMP)
DEVELOP PEDRO BAY FY22-FY25 EPA &NDASHAND TRIBAL ENVIRONMENTAL PLAN (ETEP)

DESCRIPTION:THIS PROJECT WILL ASSIST THE PEDRO BAY VILLAGE IN BUILDING CAPACITIES AND DEVELOPING PROGRAMS TO PROTECT THE TRIBAL ENVIRONMENT AND HEALTH.  OBJECTIVES/WORKPLAN COMPONENTS INCLUDE: 1. BUILDING ADMINISTRATIVE CAPACITY; 2. BUILDING PROGRAMMATIC CAPACITY; 3. BUILDING COMMUNICATIONS CAPACITY; 4. BUILDING SOLID AND HAZARDOUS WASTE MANAGEMENT CAPACITY; AND 5. BUILDING TECHNICAL CAPACITY.ACTIVITIES:WORKPLAN ACTIVITIES/TASKS INCLUDE: MAINTAINING AN ENVIRONMENTAL OFFICE AND ADMINISTRATIVE AND PROGRAM MANAGEMENT FUNCTIONS; ATTENDING TRAINING AND RESEARCHING ISSUES AND RESOURCES; COMMUNICATING INTERNALLY AND EXTERNALLY ABOUT ISSUES; CONDUCTING COMMUNITY EDUCATION ACTIVITIES; CONDUCTING SOURCE SEPARATION AND RESOURCE RECOVERY ACTIVITIES; BUILDING TECHNICAL KNOWLEDGE OF WATER, AIR, AND WASTE; DEVELOPING AN ENVIRONMENTAL INVENTORY; AND DEVELOPING SPILL RESPONSE CAPABILITIES.  SUBRECIPIENT:NO SUBAWARDS ARE INCLUDED IN THIS ASSISTANCE AGREEMENT.OUTCOMES:THE INTENDED BENEFICIARIES OF THIS PROJECT ARE THE PEDRO BAY VILLAGE, TRIBAL MEMBERS, AND THE LOCAL PUBLIC.  THE EXPECTED OUTCOMES OF THIS PROJECT INCLUDE: INCREASING TRIBAL ADMINISTRATIVE CAPACITY TO RESPOND TO LOCAL ENVIRONMENTAL CONCERNS; INCREASING TRIBAL PROGRAMMATIC CAPACITY TO ASSESS LOCAL ENVIRONMENTAL ISSUES; INCREASING COMMUNITY KNOWLEDGE OF ENVIRONMENTAL ISSUES AND ACTIONS PROTECTIVE OF THE ENVIRONMENT; DECREASING AMOUNTS OF RECYCLABLES AND HAZARDOUS WASTES ENTERING LANDFILL; AND INCREASING TRIBAL TECHNICAL CAPACITIES TO PRIORITIZE ENVIRONMENTAL NEEDS AND DEVELOP PROGRAMS TO ADDRESS THEM.  ANTICIPATED DELIVERABLES INCLUDE: PERFORMANCE REPORTS; COPIES OF OUTREACH MATERIALS; EVENT SUMMARY REPORTS; RECYCLING AND WASTE ACTIVITY REPORTS; AND AN ENVIRONMENTAL INVENTORY.

awards.awarding_agency: Department of Housing and Urban Development
Department of Housing and Urban Development
